title: Starving (feat Zedd, Gray)
lyrics: You know just what to say I should just walk away ...The more that I know you The more I want to Something inside me has changed I was so much younger yester day. .. (yeah) So much younger yester day. .. ...I didn't know that I was starving till I tasted you ...Don't need no butterflies when you give me the whole damn zoo ...By the way, by the way, you do things to my body ...And I didn't know that I was starving till I tasted you    ...By the way, by the way, you do things to my body ...And I didn't know that I was starving till I tasted you  Till I tasted you ...By the way, by the way, you do things to my body And I didn't know that I was starving till I tasted you Oooh oooh oooh Da da da da da da da da da da  da da da The more I want to Something inside me has cha nged
